SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , SUB_NAME , CNT FROM( SELECT S.SUB_NAME , CNT FROM TBL_SUBJECT S,( SELECT S.SUB_NO , COUNT(A.USER_NO) AS CNT FROM TBL_APPLY A , TBL_SUBJECT S , TBL_USER U
WHERE A.SUB_NO(+) = S.SUB_NO AND A.USER_NO = U.USER_NO
GROUP BY S.SUB_NO ORDER BY CNT DESC )T WHERE T.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO)) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd}) ORDER BY CNT DESC
